run.task¶

class run.task.Task(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: run.attribute.attribute.Attribute

meta_args¶

Tasks’s default arguments

meta_basedir¶

Task’s basedir.

If meta_chdir is True current directory will be changed to meta_basedir when task invoking.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_chdir¶

Task’s chdir status (enabled or disabled).

See also

run.Task.meta_basedir

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_dependencies¶

Task’s list of dependencies.

meta_fallback¶

Task’s fallback.

Fallback used when attribute invocation fails.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_kwargs¶

Tasks’s default keyword arguments

meta_signature¶

Task’s signature.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
depend(dependency)¶

Add custom dependency.

require(task, *args, **kwargs)¶

Add require dependency.

trigger(task, *args, **kwargs)¶

Add trigger dependency.

enable_dependency(task, category=None)¶

Enable all dependencies for task.

disable_dependency(task, category=None)¶

Disable all dependencies for task.

effective_invoke(*args, **kwargs)¶

Invoke task with effective dir, args and kwargs.

invoke(*args, **kwargs)¶

Invoke task.

class run.task.module¶

Bases: builtins.object

expand(module)¶
class run.task.task(**kwargs)¶

Bases: builtins.object

Make task from method with default kwargs to invoke.

  • as function:

    task = task(method, **kwargs)

  • as decorator:

    @task(**kwargs)
def method(self):
    pass
